job_title: Project Manager with Data Quality Management
jd: From: Rhitik Gaur, Quantum World It rhitik.gaur@quantumworldit.com Reply to: rhitik.gaur@quantumworldit.com Greeting, I hope all is well with youFor the following, Quantum World IT is seeking the best consultant profile.Please respond with your most recent resume if you are considering new opportunities. Looking Onsite || Project Manager with Data Quality Management || York, SC (Onsite)Role Description:• Strong Knowledge of Data Governance, Data Quality and Data Management principles and concepts• Expert at analyzing and modeling data using MS Excel, Access, SQL, and/or other data analytical and visualization tools (Spotfire, Qlikview, Tableau, PowerBI).• Skilled at turning business data requirements into robust data quality rules.• Adept at developing robust data quality scorecards for senior management.• Ability to manage projects, partner, and collaborate with cross functional stakeholders.• Ability to assist and support detailed analysis and propose decisions.• Understanding of data warehousing and transformation methods, lineage documentation, and ETL processes.• Subject matter knowledge of BSA regulation, bank operations/systems and/or financial services.Competencies:Data Quality management (DQM), Project ManagementPlease enter the following information is needed for submission and share your visa and Photo id Position Applied for Candidate Full Name [As per Passport] Contact Number Primary & Secondary Email ID Current Location LinkedIn Passport No. Work Authorization Had ever worked with TCS in Past (Required filed) (Contract/Full Time) Are you comfortable for on-site Had you gotten covid vaccination doses Rate expectation Thanks & RegardsRhitik GaurDirect : +1 805 973 0148Email: Rhitik.gaur@quantumworldit.comQuantum World Technologies Inc.4281 Katella Ave, Suite #102 Los Alamitos CA 90720 USA
